org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.AbstractLdapService
      org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl
          org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BasicLdapService, LdapEntityService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl
extends SimpleLdapEntityServiceImpl

Class which enable to add a cache to LDAP query, In order to improve execution time. See /properties/ldap/ldap-example.xml.

See Also:
